001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
005import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
006import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.GameField;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.Ship;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
012import io.reactivex.rxjava3.subjects.BehaviorSubject;
013import io.reactivex.rxjava3.subjects.Subject;
014import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
015import javax.inject.Inject;
016import javax.inject.Singleton;
017
018
019@Singleton
020public class PlayingFieldRepository {
021
022  private final Scheduler moveShip;
023  private final Scheduler moveMeteors;
024  private final Scheduler projectile;
025  private final Scheduler refresh;
026  private final MutableLiveData<GameField> liveGameField;
027  public double setVelocity;
028  public int setAngle;
029  boolean gameOver = false;
030  private GameField gameField;
031  private Ship ship;
032  private Subject<Boolean> ticker;
033
034  @Inject
035  public PlayingFieldRepository(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
036    moveShip = Schedulers.single();
037    moveMeteors = Schedulers.single();
038    projectile = Schedulers.single();
039    refresh = Schedulers.single();
040    liveGameField = new MutableLiveData<>();
041
042
043  }
044
045  public Observable<Boolean> run() {
046    clearTicker();
047    if (gameField.getLevel() == 0) {
048      gameField.start(1);
049    } // TODO: 11/16/23 Check to see if the game has ended.
050    ticker = BehaviorSubject.createDefault(true);
051    return ticker
052        .doAfterTerminate(() -> ticker = null)
053        .filter(Boolean.TRUE::equals)
054        .delay(100, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
055        .observeOn(refresh)
056        .map(this::tick);
057  }
058
059
060  private boolean tick(boolean running) {
061    boolean result;
062    gameField.update();
063    if (gameField.isGameOver()) {
064      result = false;
065      gameOver = true;
066    } else if (ticker != null && !ticker.hasComplete()) {
067      ticker.onNext(true);
068      result = true;
069    } else {
070      result = true;
071    }
072    liveGameField.postValue(gameField);
073    return result;
074  }
075
076  public void pause() {
077    clearTicker();
078  }
079
080  public void create() {
081    gameField = new GameField(500, 300);
082    liveGameField.postValue(gameField);
083    // TODO: 11/18/23 Create ship.
084
085  }
086
087  public GameField getGameField() {
088    return gameField;
089  }
090
091  private void clearTicker() {
092    if (ticker != null && !ticker.hasComplete()) {
093      ticker.onComplete();
094    }
095  }
096
097  public boolean isGameOver() {
098    return gameOver;
099  }
100
101  public void setGravity(double gravity) {
102    gameField.setGravity(gravity);
103  }
104
105  public void setVelocity(double velocity) {
106    gameField.setVelocity(velocity);
107  }
108
109  public void setAngle(int angle) {
110    gameField.setAngle(angle);
111  }
112
113  public void shipMoveUp() {
114    gameField.shipMoveUp();
115    liveGameField.postValue(gameField);
116  }
117
118  public void shipMoveDown() {
119    gameField.shipMoveDown();
120    liveGameField.postValue(gameField);
121  }
122
123  public void shoot() {
124    gameField.shoot();
125    liveGameField.postValue(gameField);
126  }
127
128  public LiveData<GameField> getLiveGameField() {
129    return liveGameField;
130  }
131
132  //  public void stop() {
133//
134//  }
135
136  public void timekeeper() {
137    // TODO: 11/1/23 Timer in charge of movement of objects.
138  }
139
140  public void updateShip() {
141    // TODO: 11/1/23 Add two helper methods to move ship up/down.
142
143  }
144
145
146  public void updateProjectile() {
147    // TODO: 11/1/23 Based on the velocity and angle selected the projectile will move.
148
149  }
150
151  public void gravityChanger() {
152    // TODO: 11/1/23 Create at least 3 different type of meteor (each one will have a different gravity)
153    //  that won't damage the ship but if the ship crashes with them the gravity the ship is using to shot projectile will change.
154    //  These gravityChangers are going to be generated randomly just like meteors.
155  }
156
157  public void updateMeteor() {
158// TODO: 11/1/23 Based on the width of the screen and size of ship meteor will generate a random number
159//  of meteors (from 1 to ((width/ship.size) - ship.size - gravityChanger.count)) moving from right to left leaving space for
160//  the ship to move between them.
161  }
162
163  public void enemy() {
164    // TODO: 11/1/23 Display enemies in different positions of the screen.
165  }
166
167  public void enemyIntersection() {
168
169  }
170
171  public void shipIntersection() {
172
173  }
174
175
176}
